info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 14 at 6:57AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN PUEBLO HAS ISSUED A SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT FOR... South central Huerfano County in southeastern Colorado... Eastern Costilla County in south central Colorado... Southwestern Las Animas County in southeastern Colorado... Through 8AM MDT, scattered moderate to locally heavy snow showers will continue moving southward across the extreme southern Interstate-25 corridor westward toward the southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains. This includes Interstate-25 at Raton Pass. Localized snowfall rates of 1 inch per hour, wind gusts to 30 mph, and visibilities below 2 miles may briefly accompany this activity. Be prepared for slick and snow-covered roadways. Rapid changes in visibility and slick road conditions may lead to hazardous travel. If you must travel, use extra caution and allow extra time.
